document.full_text: diego maradona was hired monday to coach the united arab emirates club al wasl, marking the argentine great's return to coaching since leading his country to the world cup quarterfinals last year.
document.title: diego maradona takes coaching job in emirates
lines_and_colors: diego maradona was hired monday to coach the united arab emirates club al wasl, marking the argentine great's return to coaching since leading his country to the world cup quarterfinals last year.
